_comment: Template for Trane Tracer Synchrony login and baseline capture
_comment_when_to_use: Use when the site is Trane Tracer Synchrony (hui/index.html and hui/hui.html)
_comment_usage: 1) Copy this file to sites/<your_site>.json, 2) Set base_url and watch URLs, 3) Set env vars for credentials, 4) Test
name: your_site_name
_comment_timing: Increase settle_ms if you see loading spinners or partial renders.
If login fails, re-check selectors in browser DevTools.
If the site uses self-signed certs, keep ignore_https_errors true.
